title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.5 - Set-aside volume
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.5 - Set-aside volume

State Regulations
(a) The

Commissioner of the State Energy Office shall determine the State set-aside
percent age level for each liquid fossil fuel made subject to the State
set-aside, not exceeding three percent, as provided in section
7900.2
of this Part. (b) The set-aside volume for each liquid
fossil fuel made subject to the State set-aside shall be the amount calculated
by multiplying the total volume of available supply of that fuel for the month, as indicated in the report filed under section
7900.4
of this Part, by the
set-aside percentage for that fuel. (c) The total set-aside volume available for
the purpose of the State set-aside program for a fuel for a particular month
shall be the sum of the volumes for that fuel reported by all prime suppliers
under section
7900.4
of this Part. (d) The State set-aside for a particular
month cannot be accumulated or deferred; it shall be made available from stocks
of prime suppliers whether directly or through their distributors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7900.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
